mapper.select: select class as id, name, stcd from rainrun where stcd = #{stcd} group by class, name, stcd order by class desc
select r.PA, rp.D, rp.R from rainrun_point rp left join rainrun r on rp.lid = r.lid where r.class = #{rainRun} order by r.pa, rp.pino asc
select id, pino, d, r from rainrun_point where lid = #{lid} order by pino asc
select m.* from model m where m.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into model(name, stcd, create_time) values(#{name}, #{stcd}, #{createTime})
